catalog_script_client.name: Live-OB: Show team roles

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_721c5fd91b2ee0d05e72ebd5604bcbb6
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:f61c5fd91b2ee0d05e72ebd5604bcb6d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Live-OB:  Show team roles</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   var team_roles_required = g_form.getValue('trigger_team_roles');
   if (team_roles_required == 'Yes') {
	   g_form.setVisible('ansible_tower_team_role', true);
	   var teamMRVS = JSON.parse(g_form.getValue('ansible_tower_team'));
	   var teams = [];
	   for (var i = 0; i < teamMRVS.length; i++) {
		   teams.push(teamMRVS[i].team_id);//add all totals from the MRVS to 1 total
        }
	   g_form.setValue('team_list', teams);
	   sessionStorage.setItem("team_list", ""+teams);
	   sessionStorage.setItem("permitted_environments", ""+g_form.getValue('permitted_environments'));
   } 
   if (team_roles_required == 'No') {
	   g_form.setVisible('ansible_tower_team_role', false);
   }  
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>e663988</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-24 23:11:48</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>721c5fd91b2ee0d05e72ebd5604bcbb6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Live-OB:  Show team roles</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower" source="x_ibmss_gts_oar_at">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="GTS_OAR_Ansible_Tower">0cf0becddb143300c66571198c961991</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_721c5fd91b2ee0d05e72ebd5604bcbb6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>e663988</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-24 23:11:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
